summary:
Nomiswap V3NMX Bridge - Nomiswap V3 is an analogue of Uniswap V3 with concentrated liquidity on the Binance Smart Chain

 First DEX in DeFi space with 0% swap fees and team farming - Backed by Nominex ecosystem

 Lowest Trade Fee in the DeFi - 0.1%

 Swap Fee Cashback - Up to 100%

 Unique combination of features across all DEXes - 

 Trading fees cashback - Make a swap on Nomiswap at no cost. Up to 100% of the trading fee returned in NMX tokens

 Utilitarian farming - The more you put in liquidity pools - the more your trading fees cashback and referral rewards in NMX tokens

 Holder Bonus - Holder bonus is the reward accrual for the duration of farming/staking. Keep funds in pools longer and earn more NMX tokens

 Binary referral system - Earn rewards from farming, staking and trading of your direct referrals, as well as from your whole team

 One of the most profitable farming & staking in whole DeFi space - 

 Earn NMX + Fees in Farming pools - 

 Boosting pool - 365 days, Auto-compound, APY 50.16%

 Boosting pool - 180 days, Auto-compound, APY 31.75%

 Boosting pool - 90 days, Auto-compound, APY 26.22%

 Manual NMX - Stake NMX — Earn NMX, APR 5.57%

 Referral program with the best conditions around the DeFi world - Earn up to 30% from the NMX tokens farmed by your team. Receive up to 40% from the trading fees paid by your team. Every day.

 Have your own project? Create custom Farming Pools - Create your own farming pools and make your community motivated to grow your token liquidity. Just in two clicks without a single line of code.

 Contracts audit by Certik - Be calm about your funds on wallet.

 Nomiswap DEX & Nominex CEX ecosystem as a single crypto space - Nominex + Nomiswap is CeDeFi ecosystem which means that using one platform you get better conditions on second platform too.

 Holder Bonus - Holder bonus is the reward accrual for the duration of farming/staking. Keep funds in pools longer and earn more.

 Trade anything. No registration, no hassle - Trade BNB Smart Chain tokens, just by connecting your wallet.

 World’s first utilitarian farming level - The more crypto you keep in liquidity pools -> the higher farming level you get -> more and higher extra reward and features you are qualified for.

 Total value locked - $4,281,650

 NMX - $0.02

 Max supply - 200,000,000 NMX

 Total supply - 103,094,000 NMX

 Circulating supply - 70,032,000 NMX

 Total burned - 8,578,790 NMX

 Market cap - $1,205,422
